thread.title: IHC Has Sights On 3rd Straight Section Crown
thread.title_full: IHC Has Sights On 3rd Straight Section Crown

title: IHC Has Sights On 3rd Straight Section Crown
text:
IHC Has Sights On 3rd Straight Section Crown Tools 
Story Published: Oct 20, 2015 at 4:13 PM EDT Story Updated: Oct 20, 2015 at 6:31 PM EDT 
The Immaculate Heart boys' soccer team is hoping for a third straight Section 3 title as postseason play begins at home Friday. The Cavaliers ended the regular season 11-3-1, earning them the number-two Class C seed. Despite an early exit in the Frontier League playoffs, the Cavaliers are ready to go. Watch the video for a postseason preview.
